vclaim: The founder of Costco told a CEO who wanted to raise the prices on Costco's hot dogs: "If you raise the effing hot dog, I will kill you. Figure it out."
title: Did Costco Founder Say ‘I Will Kill You’ to CEO Who Wanted To Raise Hot Dog Prices?
subtitle: The cost of the $1.50 hot dog and soda combo has not changed since 1985.
author: Alex Kasprak
